captions: 00:07:33 --> 00:07:40 thank tonight. I thank the voters who
00:07:37 --> 00:07:42 supported me. I thank the gallant men who
00:07:40 --> 00:07:45 entered the contest for this presidency
00:07:42 --> 00:07:48 this year and who have honored me with
00:07:45 --> 00:07:51 their support. And, for their kind and
00:07:48 --> 00:07:59 stirring words, I thank Gov. Tom Kean
00:07:51 --> 00:08:04 of New Jersey, Sen. Phil Gramm of Texas, President Gerald Ford
00:08:04 --> 00:08:15 and my friend, President Ronald Reagan. I
00:08:21 --> 00:08:26 accept your nomination for president. I
00:08:44 --> 00:08:55 mean to run hard, to fight hard,
00:08:51 --> 00:09:01 to stand on the issues and I mean to win. There
00:09:01 --> 00:09:06 stories in politics about the underdog winning,
00:09:04 --> 00:09:08 and this is going to be one of them. And we're
